file.title: Index of without quotes

p.text: command searches for your specified text and returns the number of characters, from whom, is your search text. Register of letters when searching not has a value, ie letters "A" and "a" are considered equal. If during the search in the text to meet a piece of text, isolated quotes, then this piece is passed and the search it is not performed. If nothing is found not to be, the command will return the value "0".
